ceremony.dress_code: Mountain Formal - the venue is indoor-outdoor, coats and/or layers strongly recommended!

reception.dress_code: Western Cocktail - for the Historic Saloon built in 1882!

dress_code: Bring warm clothes! Mountain Formal is formal attire in nature inspired colors and textures. Western Cocktail is dressy Western, lean into the mountain vibe and have fun with it! See Pinterest Board for inspiration.

story.content:
We met at a coffee shop on a rainy Tuesday morning. What started as a spilled latte turned into a conversation that lasted until closing time.

Five years, countless adventures, and one perfect proposal later, we're ready to say "I do" surrounded by our favorite people.

events.title: Our First Trip
events.description: We find cheap flights to Scandinavia and go on our first trip, as friends!

events.title: Dating Begins
events.description: Road trips and exploring the great outdoors together as an official couple

events.title: Louise's first time in Aspen
events.description: Hitting the slopes in Aspen - discovering our love for the mountains

events.title: Work from Anywhere
events.description: We spend the summer in Aspen working from home

events.title: Moving in Together in Raleigh
events.description: Moving in together and making a space that's truly ours

events.title: Getting Poppy
events.description: Thanksgiving gave us more to be thankful for than expected this year

events.title: Post Graduation Fun
events.description: Louise finishes grad school and opens a new world of adventures, on PTO!

events.title: The Proposal
events.description: A surprise proposal at the Maroon Bells

events.title: Move to Durham
events.description: Compare to our previous apartment photo to see how much our Bird of Paradise has grown alongside us

events.title: Adventure Awaits
events.description: Here's to a lifetime of laughter, love, and new adventures!!!

airports.name: Gunnison-Crested Butte Regional Airport
airports.description: Closest airport to Crested Butte. For these dates, only three daily flights on United from Denver. Book early! There is a free bus from the airport to Downtown.

airports.name: Montrose Regional Airport
airports.description: Year-round flights with good availability. Scenic drive with sightseeing opportunity for the Black Canyon of the Gunnison National Park nearby!!

airports.name: Denver International Airport
airports.description: Most flight options and best prices. Beautiful mountain drive but long journey.

driving_tips: Rental car recommended for mountain driving and local flexibility
There is a free bus available between Crested Butte Downtown and the Mountain Village - Mountain Express
Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns about driving in the mountains!
Be aware that gas stations are extremely limited in some parts of Colorado

registry.message: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we've registered at the following stores.

images.caption: Engagement photos at Golden Gate Park

footer.text: Made with ❤️ by Tye and Louise
